Tracklist

Notes

Made In U.S.A. ℗ 1972, 1973, 1974, 1975, 1976 RCA Records This is an 80's reissue with black dog labels. "I" in runouts denotes an RCA Records Pressing Plant, Indianapolis pressing. The lacquers of this version were cut by Sterling Sound, while [r9055277] was not. [url=http://www.discogs.com/release/1361058]Original 1976 release here[/url]. This version of 'Space Oddity' was originally published in 1972, on [url=https://www.discogs.com/David-Bowie-David-Bowie/master/32337]this LP[/url]. '[m=50761]', '[m=97318]', '[m=381010]' and 'Ziggy Stardust' ([url=https://www.discogs.com/David-Bowie-The-Rise-And-Fall-Of-Ziggy-Stardust-And-The-Spiders-From-Mars/master/1561]this LP[/url]), were originally issued in 1972 ; '[m=50492]', '[m=50400]' and '[m=51108]', in 1974 ; '[m=50555]' and '[m=50599]', in 1975 ; ℗ 1976 probably stands for the [url=https://www.discogs.com/David-Bowie-Suffragette-City-bw-Stay/master/50643]1976 single issue[/url] of ‘Sufragette City’.
